data.title: McCluskey Tree
data.text:
Tree of Ed McCluskey's students for the Computer History Exhibits

Started 2004. Most information was provided by Subhashish Mitra. We'd like to add current locations and email. Send updates by email to: gio@cs.stanford.edu (Gio Wiederhold).

This tree has been moved to The Tanford Wiki page

Professor Edward J. McCluskey

(1959 - 1967 Princeton, at Stanford in Electrical Engineering and Computer science 1966 - now)

Sc.D. MIT 1956.

Where no department is listed it is likely EE at Stanford.

year-of-PhD Name [Department, notes] (last known location, email)
